Title: Ivan Vasilievich: Back to the Future
Writer: Mikhail A. Bulgakov (play), Vladlen Bakhnov, Leonid Gaidai
Actors: Yuriy Yakovlev, Leonid Kuravlyov, Aleksandr Demyanenko, Saveliy Kramarov
Plot: An ordinary Soviet building manager, living in the 20th century, is extremely similar to a Tsar of All Rus' - Ivan IV the Terrible (1530-1584). He would never learn about it, but one day his neighbor created a time machine.
